SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT950
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message type is sent by an account servicing institution to an account owner.
It is used to transmit detailed information about all entries, whether or not caused by a S.W.I.F.T. message, booked to the account.
NOTE: Please do not disable the validation 'DC-FIX'. It provides fix for the parsing problem in field 61.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
In option F, or M, D/C Mark must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T51):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The (intermediate) opening balance is a credit balance.

Code.Name: D
Code.Description: The (intermediate) opening balance is a debit balance.

Validation.Comment: Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43).

Option.Specification: (Value Date)(Entry Date)(Debit/Credit Mark)(Funds Code)(Amount)(Transaction Type Identification Code)(Reference for the Account Owner)(Account Servicing Institution's Reference)(Supplementary Details)

Validation.Comment: Subfield 3, Debit/Credit Mark, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T51):
Subfield 1, Value Date, must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
In option F, or M, D/C Mark must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T51):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The (intermediate) closing balance is a credit balance.

Code.Name: D
Code.Description: The (intermediate) closing balance is a debit balance.

Validation.Comment: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
D/C Mark must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T51):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The closing available balance is a credit balance.

Code.Name: D
Code.Description: The closing available balance is a debit balance.

Validation.Comment: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency(Error code(s): C03,T40,T43).

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1-1
fieldvalidation.comment: "The first two characters of the three character currency code in fields 60a, 62a and 64 must be the same."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first two characters of the three character currency code in fields 60a, 62a and 64 must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C1-2
fieldvalidation.comment: "The first two characters of the three character currency code in fields 60a, 62a and 64 must be the same."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first two characters of the three character currency code in fields 60a, 62a and 64 must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: F61-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "When the first character of subfield 6, Transaction Type Identification Code, is an 'S', the remaining characters must be in the range 100-999."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When the first character of subfield 6, Transaction Type Identification Code, is an 'S', the remaining characters must be in the range 100-999."

fieldvalidation.name: F61-B
fieldvalidation.comment: "Subfield 6, Transaction Type Identification Code, should start with S, N or F."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Subfield 6, Transaction Type Identification Code, should start with S, N or F."

fieldvalidation.name: F61-C
fieldvalidation.comment: "When formats N3!c or F3!c are used, the last three characters, ie, 3!c, may contain one of the following codes: BOE, BRF, CHG, CHK, CLR, CMI, CMN, CMS, CMT, CMZ, COL, COM, DCR, DDT, DIV, ECK, EQA, FEX, INT, LBX, LDP, MSC, RTI, SEC, STO, TCK, TRF, VDA."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When formats N3!c or F3!c are used, the last three characters, ie, 3!c, may contain one of the following codes: BOE, BRF, CHG, CHK, CLR, CMI, CMN, CMS, CMT, CMZ, COL, COM, DCR, DDT, DIV, ECK, EQA, FEX, INT, LBX, LDP, MSC, RTI, SEC, STO, TCK, TRF, VDA."

fieldvalidation.name: F61-D
fieldvalidation.comment: The SWIFT System validates subfield 2, Entry Date (Date in reduced ISO form), using current System Year (Error code(s): T50).

fieldvalidation.name: DC-FIX
fieldvalidation.comment: db2admin: This validation should not be disabled. This provides fix for the parsing problem in field 61.
